statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = '98765432-abcdef-4567-8901-234567890123';
SELECT transaction_date, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = '23456789-abcd-1234-efgh-9876543210';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, amount, transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_details;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_details WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, pattern_name FROM spending_patterns WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM transaction_trends WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, date_of_birth FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT pattern_name, start_date, end_date FROM spending_patterns WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM transaction_trends WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' ORDER BY trend_start_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transaction_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.category_name FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT DISTINCT c.category_id, c.category_name FROM categories c JOIN transaction_categories tc ON c.category_id = tc.category_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, c.category_name FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
